thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1933
thread.title: SONYA

author: SONYA
title: SONYA
text: I have visited many web sites looking for optimal flights combination / price to Europe and found it on your site ; you guys have great prices and huge flight choices. are you getting this fm Farelogix ? I really like option to select airline I like; really simple booking flow and clear email receipt. WOW, you are THE BEST. I would suggest you only one thing to review; I see all options such as Stops/ airlines/dept time are all pre selected; it will be better to leave up to customer to select ones we want before search.
